Hymn.Arabic: أَنْصِتْ يَا اللَّهُ لِصَلَاتِي ، وَلَا تَغْفَلْ عَنْ تَضَرُّعِي ،
Hymn.English: 55:1 Give ear to my prayer, O God, And do not hide Yourself from my supplication.
2 Attend to me, and hear me.

Hymn.Arabic: أَنَا صَرَخْتُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَالرَّبُّ إِسْتَجَابَ لِي هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 16 I will call upon God, And the Lord shall save me.     Alleluia
